forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High near 10C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High near 50F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
